welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Dania Beach, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic and international flights for low-cost carriers such as Southwest Airlines and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic and international flights for major airlines such as Delta and United.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights for airlines such as Air Canada and Bahamasair.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for airlines such as American Airlines and Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at North Perry Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BCT airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at BCT airport is used for shipping and receiving of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
